channel.title: How To
channel.description: How Do i Fix the Stat bug on insidiaX? I've tried and tried.. searched through loads of files.. -_- The bug is basically when a new player logs in = 99 stats but lvl 3 with actually 1 stats (10hp).. Could Anyone Help? :P
